definition: two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
when two kingdoms are at war, they don't execute envoys (idiom)
pinyin: liang3 guo2 xiang1 zheng1 , bu4 zhan3 lai2 shi3

sentences.english: But they disagree over the source of their disagreement.
sentences.chinese: 然两国争执的源由是双方的严重利益分歧所在。

sentences.english: The return of the Milu deer is a good example of friendship and cooperation between China and Britain.
sentences.chinese: 麋鹿回归是中英两国友谊和合作的一个很好的例子。

sentences.english: He said some secrecy was important to avoid detection by the two governments.
sentences.chinese: 他表示为避免两国政府侦查发现，保密工作很重要。

sentences.english: Following that, the two heads of state jointly met with journalists from the media of China, Chile and other countries.
sentences.chinese: 随后两国元首共同会见了中智两国和国际传媒记者。

sentences.english: The commerce affects our people’s life in so many ways.
sentences.chinese: 这一贸易往来在很多方面影响了两国人民的生活。

sentences.english: In the new century, the relations between the two parties and countries have made new headway.
sentences.chinese: 进入新世纪，中越两党两国关系又取得了新的发展。

sentences.english: Hu said China and Mongolia are friendly neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛说，中蒙两国是山水相连的友好邻邦。

sentences.english: The great friendship and militant solidarity between the peoples of our two countries are unbreakable.
sentences.chinese: 我们两国人民的伟大友谊与战斗团结是坚不可摧的。

sentences.english: Throughout much of the cold war Beijing and Moscow were enemies.
sentences.chinese: 在冷战的许多时间里，中俄两国都处于敌对状态。

sentences.english: Facts have proven that the establishment of diplomatic ties between China and Dominica conforms to the fundamental interest of both countries.
sentences.chinese: 事实证明，中多建交符合两国的根本利益。

sentences.english: Both countries are nuclear powers and are keenly aware that a conventional military conflict would not be easily contained.
sentences.chinese: 两国都是核大国，都很清楚传统的军事冲突不易控制。

sentences.english: There has been no official confirmation of the incident from either country's military.
sentences.chinese: 目前美中两国军方都还没有对这一事件作出正式证实。

sentences.english: The friendly relations between our two countries have been speeded to a new stage.
sentences.chinese: 我们两国之间的友好关系已经推进到了一个新阶段。

sentences.english: The Moroccan government will create conditions and provide facilitations for the cooperation between businesses of both countries.
sentences.chinese: 摩洛哥政府将为两国企业合作创造条件，提供便利。

sentences.english: The friendly relationship between the two countries traces back to the last century.
sentences.chinese: 两国间的友好关系追溯到上个世纪。

sentences.english: That would be good news for future stability and prosperity (SEHK: 0803, announcements, news) in both China and the US.
sentences.chinese: 这对中美两国未来的稳定和繁荣都是好消息。

definition: Shikoku (one of the four main islands of Japan)
North and South Korea/bilateral Korean relations
